cafe.quote: <q>The most beautiful sun terrace in the Pustertal</q>
cafe.text2: Sun terrace open all year round
cafe.knownFor: We are known for our perfect cappuccino, homemade cakes and tarts, iced coffee and sundaes, organic fruit juices and our beautiful sun terrace. Our ice cream comes from a small organic ice cream factory in the Villgratental. We also offer breakfast and have a small menu with local products. We are looking forward to your visit!

history.altImage1: Historical picture of the Brückenwirt farm
history.altImage2: Flood water runs through the Brückenwirt house
history.beginning: The Brückenwirt in Heinfels near Sillian has been family-owned for over 150 years. The history of the “Brückenwirt” goes back to 1868.
history.beginning2: Since 1969, the then “Oberthaler” inn has been called “Brückenwirt”, which refers to the neighboring wooden bridge (Punbrugge).
history.beginning3: Originally, in addition to the restaurant, this traditional house also had its own butcher's shop and a small farm. The inn at the entrance to the Villgratental was an important place to stop and stay overnight for carters and merchants traveling to Lienz and Italy.
history.highWater: In 1963 Gertrud (born Oberthaler) and Heribert Pichler took over the property.
history.highWater2: Now getting on in years, they renovated the old walls with a lot of love and zeal. However, shortly before completion, the old inn was severely affected by a flood disaster in 1966. Due to the heavy rains around August 17th, the Villgraterbach found a new stream bed and flowed through the basement of the building.
history.highWater3: After unsuccessful renovation measures on the old farm, today's Brückenwirt was built between 1967 and 1969. Gertrud and Heribert Pichler have created a tradition-conscious company with a lot of hard work and love. With the handover from the parent generation to the next generation, the bridge host further develops and adapts to the needs of the present.
history.revitalisation: In 2014 the Brückenwirt was completely renovated, revitalized and reopened in autumn 2014. The rooms have been converted into high-quality apartments. Each holiday apartment has access to at least one balcony with a clear view to the east towards Lienz, to the south to the Carnic Alps or to the west. Each apartment has its own personal touch.

home.cafeIntro: Café Brückenwirt is a cozy café with a beautiful sun terrace in the Pustertal. Here you can enjoy a perfect cappuccino made from the famous Brückenwirt blend. The café also offers homemade tarts and cakes, sundaes and ice cream from the organic mountain farm in the Villgratental as well as organic fruit juices. The large garden with children's playground is another highlight of the café. The café is very conveniently located and offers a warm and personal atmosphere all year round.
home.headline: Holidays in the mountains
home.history: Our history has a lot to tell

home.metaTitle: Modern holiday apartments directly at the ski area in East Tyrol
home.title: Holidays in the mountains
home.text1:
Welcome to our apartments / holiday flats directly at the Thurntaler Sillian ski area.

Enjoy your well-deserved feel-good holiday in the middle of the mountains. The Three Peaks, the Lienz Dolomites and the Villgrat Mountains form the impressive backdrop for your activities in all seasons.
home.textmodul6: Large garden with lawn with children's play equipment

studio.title: Apartment Studio
studio.text1: Our smallest holiday apartment on the 1st floor, ideal for 2 people.
studio.text2: The pull-out couch can accommodate 3 people.
studio.text3: The holiday apartment offers a clear view to the west on its generous balcony.
studio.text4: Large windows bring lots of natural light into the bright rooms.
studio.text5: Living-bedroom with double bed and pull-out sofa bed
studio.text6: Fully equipped kitchen with dishwasher, electric stove with oven, refrigerator with freezer compartment, dishes and extensive kitchen utensils
studio.text8: Own spacious, sunny balcony (real wood floor) with approx. 9 m², table and chairs on the balcony
studio.text10: Bathroom with shower, toilet, hairdryer, towel dryer
studio.text11: Bed linen and enough towels included
studio.text12: Washing machine, drying room, ski boot dryer, mountain bike repair option in the basement
studio.text14: Use of garden, barbecue area, playground
studio.text15: Breakfast option in the cafe (please book in advance)
